    • parseCommaSeparatedList

      private static List<String> parseCommaSeparatedList(List<String> fields, int index)
      Parses the CSV list from a specified index from a list of strings Retreive the string at the given index from the given fields list
      Parameters:
      fields - the list of strings to parse
      index - the index used to parse the CSV list
      Returns:
      list the list of trimmed strings obtained from spliting the index from the given field or an empty list if the field is null,empty or invalid
